column1: [Singer] Nikola Jokic offers lifetime endorsement of JaMychal Green
JaMychal Green so far this season - 13/5/2 on 62% shooting and 8/13 from 3 on just 20 mpg. Underrated pickup after losing main FA target Jerami Grant.
The Denver Nuggets are currently running a lineup with JaMychal Green (6'8" 225lb) at center & PJ Dozier (6'6" 205lb) at PF
Since Jamychal Green rejoined the Nuggets after missing the first 4 games of the season due to injury, Denver has gone 11-5 with the 5th best offense, 10th best defense and the 3rd best net rating.
Injury list for tonights Blazers v Nuggets game: CJ McCollum, Jusuf Nurkic, Gary Harris, Paul Millsap, Zach Collins, JaMychal Green, PJ Dozier, Harry Giles, and Greg Whittington are OUT
Michael Porter Jr. says during Denver's late-fourth quarter run with JaMychal Green/Aaron Gordon at the forward spots, he told Malone, "Let them rock."

Nikola Jokić reacting to Michael Porter telling coach Malone to keep JaMychal Green out there: "Exactly...he was hot in the first quarter, first half, but he just saw that the team was playing well...he just sacrificed himself so that the group of the team would win the game." - Ryan Blackburn
[Singer] Nuggets second-half starters: Monte Morris, JaMychal Green, Paul Millsap, Austin Rivers and Markus Howard.
[Highlight] JaMychal Green gets the rebound and has an open basket to his back but passes out for a three point shot
[Charania] Free agent forward JaMychal Green has agreed to a two-year, $17 million deal to return to the Denver Nuggets, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium. Deal includes player option in Year 2.
[Charania] Free agent forward JaMychal Green has agreed to a two-year, $17 million deal to return to the Denver Nuggets, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium. Deal includes player option in Year 2.

[Jon Krawczynski] The Wolves had interest in JaMychal Green last summer. If other bigger names prove unattainable, Green could be an option. Of course $$ could be a factor. Wolves don't have much room for outside free agents.

[Charania] Pelicans and Hornets have expressed interest in Pacers center Myles Turner, sources said. Rockets, Knicks and Grizzlies trying to move up in the draft. Kyle Lowry, Jarrett Allen, JaMychal Green, Hardaway Jr., Ennis expected to have multiple suitors.
[Jake Fischer] Forward JaMychal Green could very well return to Denver, yet New Orleans and Minnesota are rumored by league sources as potential landing spots.
[Charania] Denver Nuggets forward JaMychal Green has declined his $7.6 million player option for the 2021-22 season and will become an unrestricted free agent, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Charania] Free agent forward JaMychal Green has agreed to a two-year, $17 million deal to return to the Denver Nuggets, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium . Deal includes player option in Year 2.

[Singer] Almost forgot the biggest news of the day. Asked JaMychal Green about his photo shoot with Jeff Green: “I didn’t even know anything about the Spider-Man mеme until afterwards,” J-Myke said.
